questions.question: Voltage to current converter is also called as
Which of the following application uses voltage to current converter?

answers.a: Low voltage dc and ac voltmeter

questions.question: Higher input voltage can be measured in low voltage DC voltmeter using
Which one of the following V-I converters uses the exponential relationship between current and voltage across a diode?
How will be the output voltage obtained for an ideal op-amp?

answers.a: Amplifies the difference between the two input voltages
answers.c: Amplifies products of two input voltage
